feed.title: Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 12:52 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -12.6°C
Pressure: 98.8 kPa
Visibility: 3.6 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -15.5°C
Wind: SW 30 km/h gust 59 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow early in the evening. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 20 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
